lead_paragraph: Colin Kaepernick began the game by taking a knee during the national anthem. The veteran quarterback ended it with reason to hope he'll have more games with the San Francisco 49ers.

headline.print_headline: Kaepernick Kneels for Anthem in 49ers' 31-21 Win Over Bolts
headline.main: Kaepernick Kneels for Anthem in 49ers' 31-21 Win Over Bolts
